inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, feedUrl is required. All other inputs are ignored.

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: Azure Artifacts Feed url.
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set, workloadIdentityServiceConnection is required. All other inputs are ignored. Not compatible with pythonUploadServiceConnections. Feed Url should be in the pypi upload registry format, e.g. https://pkgs.dev.azure.com/{ORG_NAME}/{PROJECT}/_packaging/{FEED_NAME}/pypi/upload/

inputs.name: artifactFeed
inputs.label: My feed name (select below)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select a feed to authenticate present in this organization.

inputs.name: pythonUploadServiceConnection
inputs.label: Feed from external organizations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an endpoint to authenticate outside this organization. Make sure the endpoint has package upload permissions.
